  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  ydb-core-protos
  core-formats-arrow
  storage-indexes-portions
)

)

  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  ydb-core-protos
  core-formats-arrow
  storage-indexes-portions
)
